result.purpose: Handles unique request IDs for requests in a Fiber web application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating middleware functionality for request ID management, with separate files for configuration, implementation, and testing.

middleware/requestid/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration for a middleware that handles unique request IDs.

middleware/requestid/requestid.go.purpose: This file implements middleware for handling request IDs in a Fiber web application.
side_effects: Adds request ID to context locals

middleware/requestid/requestid_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for a middleware that handles request IDs in a Fiber web application.
side_effects: Modifies HTTP response headers to include request ID.
